verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus the son of God
Born to be our saviour
Jesus the son of God
Born to be our Lord

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Bow down and worship Him, worship Him, worship Him
Bow down and worship Him, worship Jesus our Lord

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Jesus el hijo de Dios
Jesus el hijo de Dios
Inclinate y adorale
Inclinate y adorale
Inclinate y adorale
Cristo nuestro Senor
